lines.text: Go peddle your papers somewhere where they'd like papers peddled!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not alone at the moment.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That's true!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is very true. And I'd rather not put my life in the hands of you, not knowing you very well.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Some did. I'm here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: They are not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So something bad could happen, and you'd run away, and we'd be stuck here?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That's what all this is about, isn't it? You can't just hide from the world. I've done it! Done it for a long, long time. Maybe you being here means that I should hide no longer. Or maybe I just have an invisible frog friend. Maybe I have nothing here, and nothing here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoever has devised these contraptions and created this safety for you is a genius. I'm not saying you're necessarily--

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It was both of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I somehow don't think so.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was all me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get the sense that your compatriot-- I hate to call it friend, here--

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Isn't that right, friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unfortunately."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you doing here?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You can tell them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Just tell him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! Why, because he asked me?"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes! Be polite. They're guests in our home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, it's not our home."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: 19 years you've been here, ever since your master died trying to enter and got tricked into one of my traps, and now you're here-- does that answer your question?-- now, why don't you tell him what I just said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My master died trying to get in here on one of the traps, and now I call this my home."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Beautifully said. Bravo. You should be a little performer in Kraghammer. You know what the reviews would be? Not very good! Shameful behavior. Abysmal behavior from the Abyss itself!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have much. Many of the things that we carry are very dangerous. Obviously, you have a great deal of genius here. I'm going to show him the elemental shard. I don't know if this would interest you, but I consider it to be of great value.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're showing him the residuum piece?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The last piece of residuum I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So this is a sliver of what looks like green glass. It's finely polished, about that thick, that long. You've read about this. You've read that condensed residuum is very susceptible to enchantment and/or the focusing of short-term magic spells. It's expensive, it's lauded, it's hard to find.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I will use that Ring of Telekinesis to lift it up and take a better look at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as it darts out of your hand and wisps up, maybe two feet ahead of him, and slowly rotates above him as he inspects it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Impressive, but not as impressive as the giant log.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh, yes. But is there power in this, dear boy? Or are there only secrets? For you are secrets. He is power.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may be secrets, and that is of me, but I believe there is power in its secret. People died for that. Many people.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: People die every day. Except me. That's my punishment, child. I live on. I live on with my shame and my intelligence and you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because of Ioun?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's your relationship to her?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: What is anyone's relationship to a god?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some of us are champions. Some of them don't like them. Some of them worship them but don't really get respect. What's yours?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: All of that and more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you're a champion? Are you a champion of Ioun?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're a champion of Ioun. Of course he's a champion of Ioun.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I wouldn't say that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we might, wouldn't we?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Champion of Ioun?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (demonic cackling)

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Are you going to start calling me Ioun's Champion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Only if it bothers you, Ioun's Champion!"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I like it. Drat, eh? Drat. You tell them what you know of Ioun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's a heinous bitch who got what's coming to her 800 years ago."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: What is yours? What is your thought about Ioun?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know that she possesses knowledge that could help us in our quest to save the world, and therefore, no matter what her personality is, she is valuable to us.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: And yet, is there value in saving the world? Or should you just let it all go away?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, I think we should save it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're pro-world here.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Are you? That is interesting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sprigg, you're seeking power.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I seek redemption. There is great power in redemption.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We offer you redemption. Collaborating with us grants you the power to fell a would-be god.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Excuse me. For one second. Can I speak to you for just a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (flapping wings) "What?"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: L! Let's grab that elf boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, all right." You guys can hear all of this.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: F. Forsooth, I shall grab this elf boy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not an elf. Not an elf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do people like calling you elf boy and elf girl?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have vaguely pointed ears. Not even fully pointed ears. My mother was not an elf.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Just a second. He's not an elf!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll stick with the device. I've got your back."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I still don't feel it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You will."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: All right. Hello!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi. Hi, mirror man. Listen.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's cut to the chase here. We need information from you.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You need something from us. Grog, give him a card.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're dancing around this! We need this man!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He took the stone! Are you taking the stone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to take the stone as a source of power? He said it's too mysterious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought we were talking about redemption.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: If you'll allow me. You've been very quiet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're my worst fear incarnate. Sorry, that seemed very rude. My worst nightmare incarnate.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That didn't make it any better, dear child!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cackling)

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (shushing) Go ahead. Why am I your worst fear in a carnation?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've seen you in my dreams.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Hear that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go get her, tiger."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket starts chasing the imp around the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!" Up into the corner, (hissing). Turns invisible.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh, I guess you found that unbearable!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was a good pun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the tiniest little demonic fart by your ear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm also gently steering Trinket away from the floorboard in the middle of the room as he walked by.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Somehow everything you have said since the minute we've walked into this building has made 100% sense, and I think that's what scares me the most, is I understand everything you've said.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: And we fought, and we fought, and they were right here. They were right here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who is they?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: My companions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And who were you fighting against? You, we?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vecna.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gods?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It was silly. It was hobgoblins. It should never have happened. It was a simple fight, and they died, and I ran, and I can't even remember their names.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sprigg.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you like to be needed again? Maybe it's time to stop running.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: What would I do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can grant you power in items, but I don't want to speak for all of us, but I think all of us can speak a little bit to the fact that items don't grant you as much inner power as you expect them to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless they're boots. And then they're amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless they're very highly argued and debated-upon boots, in which case I still think the argument--

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Are we about to have a debate about boots? I'm against them! Your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am for them, usually.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Continue, Councilor, but watch yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you any idea where the key to Ioun is?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: In the boots? We're talking about boots, are we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Boots that hold a key to Ioun's location. Specifically.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I think the key might be here, but I don't really know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's worse than hobgoblins. We've come here in great need, and the world is in great need, and the power that I offer you is making a difference.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Then make me believe in Ioun. We'll make a difference together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make you believe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course he believes. Believing is not the question.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Books everywhere, you see. That's something you can hold. That's something you can learn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's something that's tangible. Ioun is distant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But she could be tangible if you'd help us find her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we have found her? What if Sprigg is right? What if all of the information that Ioun knows is here in Sprigg?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really want to look at these. I want to look at these books really quickly. I'm having a moment. I just want to start looking at these titles. What are these books?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sourceless, delivered to your consciousness directly. "Thank you for showing me where he is." And that's where we're going to take a break.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How? We don't have the eye! What a cock!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, he's been in the troll dick all along.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's always been the troll dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we'll be in just a minute. We'll be back here in a few minutes, guys. For the Twitch giveaway, we have this awesome Peruvian walnut dice tray, leather interior. It's very nice. It's the same type that I have, actually, back here, which is nice. Giving it away for somebody in the Twitch chat, so run on over, and the code for the evening is Sprigg. S-P-R-I...

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: G-G.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: G-G. Double G.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: S-P-R-I-G-G spells Sprigg, ladies and gentlemen, if you want to win that valuable prize.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome back. All right, so first and foremost, we have our winner for the dice tray from Wyrmwood. That is our friend k0sn1ght, spelled in the way that you spell your XBox Live name: k0sn1ght. Congratulations, you are the winner. Go ahead and contact Danoba and get your information and we'll get that shipped out to you. Bringing us back in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last we left off, you all, almost all of you, heard a singular familiar voice. The low, gravelly undead voice of The Whispered One fills your minds, saying, "Thank you for showing me "where he is." In that moment where you all pause in place, you hear a series of simultaneous sounds (arrows firing) as a number of heavy crossbow bolts from nearby windows all fire simultaneously at Sprigg.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have time for a reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not. This is a surprise round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the sound of bolts, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that first one is a 24. What's your armor class?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: My armor class is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! So you take 23 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Okay. Oh, there we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another one rushes by and glances off your other shoulder. The third one--

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Well, this is different.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. That's a 25. That's 23 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slams into one of the nearby books right behind you, barely moving past your cheek. Fifth one, that is a 19 exactly, so you take 24 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many fucking bolts are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all sneak attack. And that is 20.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Another one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another one.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one's going to be 26 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'm gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch as all these bolts (arrows firing and impacting) into Sprigg's body and Sprigg falls back, unconscious on the side of the room. I'm going to bring out a map now.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Fly, you fools!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling) No, Sprigg!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks so much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, cool!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, this is a cute house!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I can't see inside of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moving the top floor off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's crates of apples!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a sack of something in the corner! Oh my god, how are we all going to fit in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sprigg is currently unconscious on the ground there. Percival was there talking. Trinket is off to the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket! Where's the imp?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The imp is not currently visible. Pike would be over on the side here. Keyleth, Vax, where would you guys see yourselves right now? Actually, tell me where you would be. I think that's what I'm trying to ask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would be right next to Keyleth because I was holding her hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As I chuck you onto the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all right. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, comes back in a day later. All right, cool. So you're there holding that. Scanlan, where would you be?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Near Sprigg-ish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so I'll put you right there next to the scroll in the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Matt? Could you touch on the map where the bad man touched you? No, where the bad floorboard is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, actually, I can do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: None of you know this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: None of you know this, except for you, which is actually why I'm not going to show you. You know how to avoid it, but nobody else knows where it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where is the front door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The front door is right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There, over by Grog on your right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These trees need to move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, these trees are a pain in our butts. Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's cloaked men everywhere

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as one that was up in the stairs vanishes up top.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, he actually made it upstairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He fired, and then ducked up there. I need everyone to roll initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Including you, even though you're on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't. Fuck. Me. Gil. It's fine. Gil did all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't trust Gil. I never roll on his dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rarely. I have, but I got my Matt Colville meteorite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh wow, so we have Percy, we have Grog, and Vax. Okay, 20 to 15?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should somebody roll for Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, actually. Okay, yeah.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Also a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got a very low initiative bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, anybody else?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 12. I don't know why I did deuces. 12.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Peace out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: NKOTB.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 12 initiative, Wu Tang out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's our next shirt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quidd, everyone. Quidd.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quidd.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quid pro quo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so top of the combat round. The surprise round is done, you watch Sprigg fall to the ground, bolts sticking out of the side of the neck, the shoulder, and the body. Unconscious, now beginning to pool blood underneath where he's bleeding out, and you glance around and you see a series of shaded figures in the windows that all dart out of the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cowards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dicks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, they left. The fight's over, everyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're up first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, this is a lot that happened. I'm going to click my boots, and I'm going to run up the wall and run upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, for the purposes of this, I will place the upstairs over here. So as you dart up, Percival, you run up the stairway there where the one guy you saw was standing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is he right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he ducked out of the way, and there's also one figure that you recognize from the Shadowfell earlier. You see one of the ghastly creatures that was darting through the ruins leaping from from rooftop to rooftop. Its skin is grayish and long, its limbs lanky, its fingers curled into claws, and this long tongue dangling from his jaws, it's getting ready to run down the stairs as you charge him, and it goes (growls).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Manners! Action Surge!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay, Manners!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're bad at manners, until now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so what's the saving throw on that one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a DC 20 strength. Oh, I'm sorry, no. Never mind. It's an attack roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you have to roll first to see if you hit it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It falls to the ground, prone, unable to move, right there in the middle of the floor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just making sure that I can do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Was that your action, there, doing that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was my action surge. I can only do one round. Just seeing if I have anything at a bonus that I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spent your action--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My action, I activated my boots. My action surge activating that. Do I have anything I can do with a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not really.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to turn to the other guy and pull the ripcord on the glove angrily. (revving)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You load up Diplomacy. Good. That's your turn, Percy. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me? Oh? Can I go into a rage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And he fell where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He fell right there, on the ground, currently bleeding out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run over to Sprigg and shove a-- should I shove a health potion in his throat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we've got healers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. I'll run upstairs to see where Percy went.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rage-run just past Percival and you see there's one creature bound on the ground and there's another guy who's there with his crossbow, he's trying to reload, who sees Percival and is getting ready to pull it up as you leap in front.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Smash him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you mind?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. (rage noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for a double attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 30, minus-- oh, there is no minus. 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32 hits. Second attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Go ahead and roll damage for both.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So they're not giants. So I just roll a d10. That's a ten. Rage damage. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 damage on the first hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the first one. Second one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see now, up close, you can see these figures, they're dressed in very, very tight black leathers, cloaks enshrouding their body, the hood is still up, but you've knocked it back. There you see a human male in his late 40s, early 50s, the head shaved completely bald, a tattoo of black tendrils around the left eye, and the left eye is missing from the socket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Black tendrils? Okay, cool. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, let's talk this out. Click the Boots of Haste. I think, with 120 feet of movement, I can blur up the stairs to where Percy is in probably 50 or 60 feet. And then finish that movement and go past the guy, out the window, with all of my movement in 120 feet or less. Okay, so I'm doing that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's also a window here, a window here, and a window here. Just so you guys know, and a window here, if you wanted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Definitely understand. Blur up the stairs, shoot past Percy, shoot past that guy, out the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on the balcony now, looking right about here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I already see those guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 19 plus 14 is a hell of a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 plus 14? Yeah, you do see them. And you glance down, you can see they're hiding amongst bushes, and they're specifically stealthed. But you're keen of eye enough to see where they're placed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I stealth, hide. Bonus action to hide. I'm going to use Luck. That's better. 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27. Okay. You're not sure if they see you or not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, then from this spot, if they're in range, I'm going to throw Whisper at one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, you are currently up here. So you glance off and you can barely see one that's over the edge of the roof right there. That's the only one you can see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I can see them and I can ignore three-quarters cover because of Sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sharpshooter. I'd say yeah, you can. You can hit both, if you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So the one that I can see, hidden, I will try to throw Whisper. I'm going to hopefully sneak attack him and bamf there. That is a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28. He does not see you. So you have advantage on that if you want to roll again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right. Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Turn him into paste.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. (counting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did Pike roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did she get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. Typical Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's after me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's before we are. So I'd rather get him up before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that one is 60 on that guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 points of damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, and I bamf there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you chuck the dagger, like right towards where the center of the shoulderblades connect in the back he (groans) and you watch as the crossbow that he had drops to the ground and he crumples over on top of it, but he slowly starts getting to his feet out of the bushes. He looks really hurt, but he's still standing. And you appear right next to him there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I did movement, I hid for my bonus, I have action-action as a paladin. And action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have attack-attack as a paladin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Attack-attack as a paladin. And then my bonus action. That was the first of attack-attack, so now I'll just do a regular attack, which is a 20--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sarcastically) I'm so glad he got those boots back, I'm just so glad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a ten and I'm going to pump him full of poison. He has to make a DC check on 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a seven. No. Four plus three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20 total, between the dagger and the poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the second dagger, you shiv him in the side and he (groans) goes to spin with the heavy crossbow and try and pull away, and as soon as the poison through him he goes, (gurgles) and you can see blood vomit down the front of his chest, his eyes roll back and he twinges and falls to the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And there's another guy there who can see me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and he's hidden, but he's like (scared, heavy breathing).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whisper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, he's trying to see that you're not being seen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is 31. Yeah, okay. So that is two plus eight is ten, plus psychic damage. 18. I'm going to bamf there with Whisper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All righty. You hit him and you stand there. You're right in front of him now. All righty. That ends your go. As you appear over on the other side, you realize that over in the clearing there, there is another one of the robed figures, this one clutching a long, black, smooth staff that crooks over in the front that looks like a hand holding an eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Where? Who? There

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you guys don't know that yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending your turn, Vax. That guy on the ground is going to try and break free. That is a 17. DC 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: DC 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It struggles on the ground and can't seem to break free of the current magic manacles that hold it in place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, he's stuck. I love that we have floors!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another one of these darts through the window, leaps across the way, right in front of Sprigg, and you being right there, Scanlan, goes, (angry hissing) and lashes out at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going for Sprigg!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's going for Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But because Scanlan's over Sprigg!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Makes two claw strikes at you. First one is 16 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You suffer eight points of slashing damage, and I need you make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. Not great. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it magical?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20 to hit, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 30 points of slashing damage on the second hit. Make another saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. The second strike hits you and you feel as the side of your torso gets torn out of the side, the blood splatters onto Sprigg, who's already bloodied and now there's gnome blood on gnome blood. As you reach for your side, however, it does not take effect; you manage to shrug off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those are constitution saving throws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sprigg, I need you to make a death saving throw, please. Roll a d20.

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Sprigg!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am going to, bonus action-- down here, success, one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, before he even does that, what are you doing on your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to heal him first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That roll wouldn't matter because he may heal you before you come up. Don't worry about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll bonus action Healing Word him, 2nd-level. I will sing to him. I'll do a little line dance right in front of him and I'll say: (singing) I'll heal your heart, your achy breaky heart. I just don't think you'll understand. That if I heal your heart, your achy breaky heart, you got to wake up and kill a man!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (singing) If only you had used Mage Hand!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So how much does he heal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven plus six. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You heal 13 hit points. That roll doesn't matter. You hear this echoing song in the back of your head. The second song today you've heard from your childhood. You come to consciousness. You wake up and look around you and you can see him singing to you as this giant horrible necrotic creature is looming right in front of you. You have metal bolts sticking out of your chest and an old sensation you haven't felt in a long time courses through your body, which is the need to survive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's my turn still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's both of your turns at the same time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will hold my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dimension Door, but I'm holding until either Pike or Keyleth heals him more. And I will also say to him, old man, do you have some fight left in you?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I hope so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold that thought for one second.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you doing?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: There's a bookcase, is there not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's books strewn and clustered in these corners.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'd like to, if I could, use the Ring of Telekinesis to pull a bookcase down upon an attacker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Currently there's a bunch of books up here on a shelf, you can pull them down on him if you'd like.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I would like to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So from the ground, you yank a bunch of heavy tomes off of this large shelf that goes flying towards this creature. I'm going to make this a dexterity saving throw for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The pen is mightier than the bookcase security!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC on the telekinesis ring?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Where was it? Ring of Telekinesis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. No, that's a failure. So for this, go ahead and roll 3d6.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He failed, or the guy failed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guy failed. He didn't dodge out of the way. He's like, (confused snarling, book impacts) and gets pummeled from behind by a bunch of tomes, books, and random glass baubles that were on the shelf that shatter against the back of its head.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: We have a six, we have a five, and we have a two. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then add your intelligence modifier.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: My intelligence modifier is a four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you slam it in the back of the head (impacts) and it doubles over and (snarling), its long tongue slashing around. You're still on the ground, and it's over you. Is there anything else you want to do on your turn?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Demistrik?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not cool.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Can I cast something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is an action to do that, so if you have a bonus action spell, you could do that.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I believe I do. Tasha's Hideous Laughter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe that's an action to cast, unfortunately.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh, are there any healing potions that I can use my Telekinesis to get a healing potion to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that next round. The attack was your one action. You can stand on your feet, if you'd like to.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: No, I'm gonna stay right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. That ends your turn. Now, these guys go again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good, they're at disadvantage, now, to hit you. They are! Because you're prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy's going to move in. This guy is still standing and is going to drop the crossbow and pull out his shortsword. Is going to go ahead and attack you, Grog, first. That is 13?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 27.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take five plus four, that's nine points of slashing damage, reduced to five, yeah. Round down, so it's four. Struck twice, missed both. Both of these guys are going to fire at-- one of them's going to fire at Sprigg on this end because it's their goal, here. With disadvantage, that is a 16? What's your AC again?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: My AC is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see the other guy pulling back with a crossbow and fire. You roll out of the way and it (arrow vibrating) into the wooden flooring right next to you.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Are there any traps that they hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. That one is going to attack you, Vax, because you're right there in front of it. That's going to be a 13. Does not hit. Second strike, another 13. Both of its shortsword attacks, you duck out of the way and dodge, moving around very quickly. All righty. Those two right there, one of them is going to, because it saw that you got up, Scanlan, they're going to fire two bolts directly at you. That is a 16 to hit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and the second one is a 24.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everything hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently in base-to-base with one of their companions, so they both get sneak attack on you. 19 points of piercing damage from the first hit. 24 points of piercing damage from the second hit. And then they both duck around the side here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was the second one? 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, the guy in the back right there, who noticed Vax show up, is going to, after you slaughter one of the guys, and stab the other one, is going to angrily go ahead and use Blight on you. Can you go ahead an make a constitution saving throw, please?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20. You fucking dick, necro guy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That does half the damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's still a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like a natural 20 should auto-fail this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of necrotic damage to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is going to-- four, five, six. All righty. That ends his turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run over to the window that those guys disappeared from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over this way or this way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right there, yeah. Can I see that motherfucker? Did I see him run past the window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? Yes, because he was not stealthing. You watch as he darts by, and you would have a shot, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Hunter's Mark him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, look at that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket doesn't have enough movement to get over by him, does he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but Trinket can attack whatever's in your area, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31? That hits!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Okay! Do I get sneak attack on him? I don't, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn! At least I got Hunter's Mark. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey Matt, I realized. I never shot out the wings, so I shouldn't have had as much movement as I did, so I think we should take the damage back from my last attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting). 50 to get up to the top there, so at your double speed, you'd be at 60, threw the dagger and threw the dagger. You're fine. It still works out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's balls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on deck, Keyleth, just so you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven, nine, plus nine is 37. 37 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first arrow hits him in the stomach, doubles forward and pulls back. Now, glancing over, saw you rush up and couldn't get out in time and now is going to try and back up as you're taking the second shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he roll a DC of over 17? A strength save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, silly necromancer. You and your strength of nine. All right, so he is currently entangled in the brambles as the vines wrap around and pull him in, almost near the tree. You see the staff is pulled close to his chest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight more for the Blazing Bowstring. And then I'm going to shoot him again. I'm just asking: do you get sneak attack damage if they're restrained?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yeah. You can do that. You have advantage on the attack, remember, because he's restrained.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay. Eight plus 14 is what? 32?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh gosh! Okay! Ten, 11, 12, 13, plus sneak attack. 13. What's that? Ten. So 23. And then Hunter's Mark. Plus one. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. Nice. The second arrow hits right in the throat, and you can see it doesn't hit anything vital, but you can see blood's starting to pour out. It's one of those things that if he were to pull it out, it would probably be very bad. But he's leaving it in right now. He's looking pretty rough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The necromancer is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. All righty. That ends your turn? Keyleth, your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to step away from the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Step away from the window.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, against the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against the wall there? You push the table back a bit; book almost falls off the top. What's Trinket doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket is going to run over to Sprigg and Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to Scanlan, or the guy who's there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to the guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just try to growl at him and scare him because he can't attack him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's technically now engaged with the bear, so if he walks away, the bear gets an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. In my weird, emotional panic, Keyleth is going to turn and look around and she sees Vex firing a bow and Sprigg down on the floor, and she's upset, and she's just going to scream at the top of her lungs and do a Fire Storm around the building. Just (screams) and then I'm going to go (boof) where I think people might be in my rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! So around the building where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Around the building. Sorry, Vax. I don't really know you're there, but around here and around here, and I'm sure I see Vex shooting at things, right? I'm going to try and go around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have right here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, around, and that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Okay, because you didn't see Vax outside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. He's getting hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw Vax run upstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just know there were people shooting through this window and through this window, so I'm doing a perimeter around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many squares is it? Ten, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten ten-by-tens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These two here get caught in it, as well as Vax and that guy there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the magician guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If she's doing a perimeter? No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you know that I was shooting at somebody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She doesn't see the magician. Doesn't know where it is. "The Magician." The Prestige!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have evasion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which means it's either half or nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do I have to match?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her DC, which is 21, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, way higher than that. We're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you take no damage. You duck out of the Fire Storm just in time for it to (raging fire).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need two more d10s.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, dexterity save, man. Area effect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Smoky d10 and spiky d10. And you get rerolls!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reroll ones. None of these are ones, unfortunately. (counting)

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Bravo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! Bravo to Dwarven Forge, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's your house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: True. Good torches you have in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Way to be energy-conscious with those LEDs!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 39 fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 39 damage. This guy incinerates. He screams and burns. He manages to dodge partway out, but even the partial damage burns him and he (screams). You see him run off into the forest ten or so steps, on fire, like a stun man shot in a movie before he (impact) on the ground and smolders there in the distance. Those guys take it. What was the amount again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 39, and they're on fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's hard to stealth when you're on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both on fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So that was my action. I'm going to do that out of my staff as I slam it down. I'm going to look at Sprigg and say: gods damn it, Sprigg! And I'm going to use that as my Healing Word, and I'm going to cast Healing Word at second level. Which is 2d4. 11 points to you. And then I'm going to use my free action that I have to turn into a fire elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your free action?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Circle of the Moon, bitch!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you just call your fiancé--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- a bitch?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Combat wild shape.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Combat Wild Shape makes it a bonus action, as opposed to an action. That's the difference.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to retract my "bitch," please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, so I'm just Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that end your turn? All right, so as Keyleth's turn ends, it comes to Pike's. The entire exterior perimeter of this part of the house is on fire. Flames are now starting to catch. It is dry wood; the entire building is made from wood of the forest, so your home is now in flames.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, hang on. No, I'm doing the perimeter. I did think about this, which is why I didn't attack the guy in the house.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you napalm the forest, the trees will probably catch fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a quick jump, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flames are starting to lick up the sides.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: End it quick, we can save it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fire Storm's a dangerous spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's try to save those books before they all burn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's an old guy. We were either going to kill him or burn his house down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Vox Machina's MO, man!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was always going to end this way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things you own end up owning you.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: So glad I wore a jacket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a heal fountain on you. That is six plus five. That's 11 hit points you heal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As soon as she does that, I grab him and we Dimension Door out the house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you Dimension Door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Outside the front door. Not right outside, but towards the edge of the map there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, anywhere around there, on approach to the house.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or do you want to be more over yonder?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's the front door to the house?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'd be 20 feet, the way we approached to the house. So where you got it, if that's the way we approached.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys approached this direction. So you're there. Make a perception check, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You don't see the two hidden fellows over here. You see something large and hulking moving through the forest this direction, at a quick glance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it naked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then we're going to be okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still on the ground and all of a sudden your body physically shifts, and you're looking up at the trees. You glance around and you can see the back of your house, you can hear the frantic fray going on. You see the necromancer who's currently covered in brambles and held in place. You see a couple of guys on fire, on the side screaming on the side of the house, and your house starting to catch fire. That's okay. Pike, on her turn, is going to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth has anger issues. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it's a single target...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the "This is fine" meme, except it's just Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she doing it to the magician?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this guy right there, in the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's an illusionist, Laura.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is she doing it against Copperfield? Is David Blaine with them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The next attack against it has advantage. And then Pike's going to back up with you, Vex, towards the back where the bookcase is and goes, "You smell something?" You now hear, simultaneously, (slow thudding) and watch as the side wall and the back wall explode inward, as splinters of wood and stone (crashing) comes from this wall here--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, all of his stuff!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I didn't destroy your house

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Flames! Flames, less of a thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the side of the house.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Flames on the side of the house!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two familiar hulking entities come barrelling into the chamber. Remember those giant things you saw walking through the Shadowfell that you barely avoided with the mask?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The censer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't carry a fucking giant smoking censer with you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really? I didn't realize it was that big.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think at that point, I think we put it in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you did make a bunch of those herbs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do have the herbs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And there's a shit-ton of shit on fire right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They burst through. (roaring) This big yell echoes through their metal masks. It sounds like this horrible-- imagine a giant vocal scream that's peaking on the audio level against a tinny metallic speaker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Bane voice) Your punishment will be more severe!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially. This one's going to go after Keyleth. This one's going to make two swipes at Trinket because Trinket's right there. As they barrel through, part of the roof breaks. Guys up top, Percy and Grog, you feel the ground buckle a little bit below you and you drop about two or three inches as the building is starting to lose its physical frame.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, Grog, what did Keyleth do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, Keyleth. You beat me by one second!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm well aware. It was totally worth it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: #thanksKeyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's one's going to go ahead and do two slam attacks against Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I've earned it. Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 23 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's a 29 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second fist actually pins you up against the wall there, and you feel ribs crack inside your chest and now-- they're both down low in this hulking mass. They're almost wider than they are any other dimension with how they're crouched down and the thickness of their body. They're taking up almost the entirety of the room right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said 30 points, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, for the second one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm at 83 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. The other one's going to slam twice into Trinket. Giant fists. That's going to be a 28.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 28 hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 22.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 22 hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is five plus six. 11 points of bludgeoning damage to Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Halved, correct. And 22 points of bludgeoning damage, halved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so 11 plus six is 27 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends their go. We're at the top of the round. Percy, you're upstairs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay, I know where I am. I'm going to run out onto the balcony really quick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's room over here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That guy's still up there with us, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I figure you're going to handle him. Grog, take care of these two. What do I see outside on the balcony?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see, currently down below-- make a perception check. Actually, you wouldn't even see them from your perspective.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just rolled a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, it's blocking your vision from this side. You do see Scanlan, you see Sprigg who is currently conscious, you see this necromancer who is currently held with brambles, and you see two streaking flames and hear screams on this side of the building.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Weird question, really quickly. Where is that giant log trap?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much swing does it have? Is it locked all the way over here, or is it hung back there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks more like a drop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take some fun, happy pot shots at these bastards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At the necromancer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the necromancer! Let's start with that bound necromancer. He's fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With the Vecna eye.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With the Vecna eye. He's bound, so I have advantage to hit him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh darn, it was so close. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's-- ooh! Fancy. 18 points of damage, four points of psychic damage, and he has to make a strength saving throw or drops his items.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, don't worry, he drops the staff, because there's not much left of his head. When you hit the arm, the staff's clutching, but you slam it and it hits the side of the head and causes the right side of the face to explode against the tree, the brambles still clutching as it falls limp to the ground, and they crush the body into a small rock of flesh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get a grit point back, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get a grit point back, you get a grit point back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just barely see them; they have three-quarters cover. But you have sharpshooter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three-quarters cover, what does that mean in this crazy world? I'm going to burn a grit for advantage and shoot one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one right furthest on the side there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I'll start there. Let's give it a shot. I love advantage; it's so wonderful. 32. I really should have done extra damage. So that's 1d10 plus six. That hits, obviously. 32 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. Goodbye, necromancer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 17 points of damage plus two points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much was that, sorry?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 17 points of damage plus two points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bullet impact, yelps) He starts looking up to see where the shot came from as the giant bullet wound through the torso and out the back of the shoulder was clean through. You hear him breathing, gasping for breath. (gasping)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make this a sharpshooter shot, and again with advantage because that's fun. Here we go. Damn! Almost a crit. That's 29. That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, yeah. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 14 points of damage-- I'm sorry, 24 points of damage plus two points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He falls to the ground, face first. The second shot hits him in the chest. He just goes down, crumples. His body begins to smolder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I use my bonus action to reload and stare at the nice person below me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the guy in front of you who's like, (angry breathing). What are you going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I smash my Titanstone Knuckles together and cast Enlarge on myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can! And your head goes into the roof! (thudding)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're real sorry about your house.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It wasn't a house. It was a prison.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, then you're welcome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm hoping the floor gives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The floor gives out. As your head (crashing) into the ceiling (creaking, crashing) it falls out from under you. You come falling down on top of this guy. Rubble falls around. Keyleth, I need you to make a dexterity saving throw. I need Trinket to make a dexterity saving throw. The other shadow ghast fails.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket, you, and the shadow ghast all take 22 points of bludgeoning damage as the roof caves in over on top. Large part of the upper floor now falls and this guy stumbles and is now prone there. He also takes damage. You take 22 points of bludgeoning damage from falling through the wreckage. Trinket's is halved, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh, debris, ugh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That kills him. The shadow ghast right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because he had barely any left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. He's like, "Huh?" (crashing) Gets rained on with rubble, broken, splintered wood and stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The guy in Manners, he fell too, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His part of the ceiling didn't fully collapse. He's just out of the way. He's dangling off the edge right now, as he shakes, it's making its way towards the hole. The whole ceiling didn't collapse, just the area right below.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beautiful. Can I take Tweedledee to my right and make two reckless attacks against him? They're not giants, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're not giants. They're considered undead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're considered undead. 30 to hit. And the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Big targets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So ten. 24 points. Plus the Enlarge-- 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 with the first hit. (whack)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 22 with the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 damage on the second hit. (whacks) You're hitting him. Laying on its back, it has these metal spikes jamming out of its flesh. You can see portions of other creatures that it had slain that have been jammed on these spikes and rotted away on its armor. So as you're hitting it, you're knocking away parts of partially decomposed creatures that previously fell in battle to one of these creatures. As you're slamming into it, you can see it's just rippling, partially decayed muscle that seems to be unnaturally strengthened by whatever necrotic energy keeps it stitched together and alive. It's a thick sack of hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. Cool. Good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that your turn; are you doing anything else?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's interesting. I'm going to go into a frenzied rage as my bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of Grog's turn. Vax, you're up. You heard all this go on and now the whole building is starting to catch fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to bolt to that window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, other way. So I have a view of Keyleth, the creature, and Grog. I'm going to throw Whisper-- I've got sharpshooter-- at that thing, and bamf there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, at proximity to the flames that are starting to catch, you do take three points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You threw the dagger at the big guy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whisper goes to the window at that guy there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it's flanking, right? Because of where Grog is, or Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not flanking, but you get to add sneak attack modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, that's fine. That's 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. So you appear next to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three plus psychic damage is four plus this junk. (counting) 33, doubled to 66 plus psychic damage is 74. Bamf there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you appear next to it. As the dagger sinks into its torso, you watch as its chest muscles and the iron cage-like armor around it seems to swallow the dagger. As it goes inside, you watch as some of the muscles all of a sudden (squelch) fall off of its body, like whatever energy's holding it together is untethered and this weird, fleshy, stitched-together creature is starting to fall apart. It's looking pretty hurt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so here's what I wanted to do. So movement-- and I have action-action, action, action-- action-action, action, bonus action.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: (repeating) Action, action--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, it's the rules in the book! You can bust my balls all you want--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that's your first attack, so you have your second attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So action-action for my regular attack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Attack-attack!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just semantics. Attack-attack, hasted action, bonus action. So that was the first of my attack-attacks. And here's the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm dumping a level two Smite into this, against an undead. That's seven, 10, 11. Ooh, it's cocked. 17 for that hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 with the additional--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With attack-attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Well, but you said you dumped Divine Smite into that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Into that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did the additional damage for it being undead? Okay, so that was how much total?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever I just said. It was like 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. 17 will do it, actually. So as you rush in with the second dagger, you jam up into the same space where it's falling apart, and you hear this dull (shockwave sound) on the inside as the divine energy radiates from the strike and its body (slurping) sloughs off of the bones and around your arm. It slowly falls around your arm like old gelatin and (slurping) slips into the ground, covering the floor around you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 29, and the second one is higher than 29. I'm going to dump Smite into it. Three-- you're making me mess up the math, Laura!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Psychic damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughing) I can't keep track of the math!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) Epic-level DND!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 25 on that towards that guy, with Smite added. And then the last dagger, with Smite, at level one, is two plus is 10, 14, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I dumped a ton of Smite into that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't add your modifier to the third strike, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, so why don't you just minus six? 19, so we'll call it 13. Some people might have been catcalling me while I was trying to do math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. No worries. You hit with the two final strikes. They blast into it. You watch as some of the armor gets thrown off its body. It takes a little hit, but the other creature looks like it's largely all right. That finishes Vax's turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me enjoy my last two months of life!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shadow ghast. What's the DC on the sphere again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it 20? 19. He can't escape from this freaking sphere. The shadow ghast is up on the second floor going (growling). Manners, man. All right. Scanlan and Sprigg, what do you guys want to do?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I have a question. The gentleman who had an arrow in his throat: he's gone, right? He's been blown apart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Actually, make a perception check.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Okay. That's a d20, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, d20 and then add your perception modifier.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Got it. That's a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 17, okay. You glance over and you see two guys who are hiding amongst the bushes on the side there.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Now, it's too far away to cast a spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, depending on the spell's range, depending on what you want to do.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Tasha's Hideous Laughter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That we can do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's such a good spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a fun one. So bringing up Tasha's here, looking at the range. There we go. It's a 30-feet range, so you want to get up and get a little closer, probably.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I will do that, if I could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So one guy of these two you can select.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: The first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one there? All righty.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes. I think his name is Dave? Roll a perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a saving throw, a wisdom save. That is a ten! Your spell DC is a 17. You watch as the guy there who has his crossbow out and sees you get up, spins around, has this giant, heavy crossbow, the bolt very recognizable because you still have three of them in your body. Aims it towards you and then suddenly (maniacal laughter) and drops the crossbow to the ground and doubles over laughing, falling to the ground and is now kicking and laughing like a hyena right now, unable to do anything.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Knock knock!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (maniacal laughter)

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Right! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, is that your turn?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's another guy over there? Have I seen him yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't, actually. You do see this guy's on fire right now, who is still around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I see somebody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and you can see that hulking figure come running through, and you hear the (explosion) through the back of the building.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For the beginning of the round, I'll say, guys, I think large giants are coming. Be aware.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? I can't hear you! Speak clearly!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Threepio! Where could he be?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Shit. I'll approach the guy I can see burning, on fire. That's where the front door is, right? Is he in front of the front door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The log is right up in this area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. That. So I'll take out my Wand of Magic Missiles, and I will just take down the rope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they explode, it's enough of an impact to cause it, as opposed to fall straight down, just spin and fall. I'm going to go ahead and roll a dice to see which direction it's going to land from its front point. So we'll say inward would be one, two, three, four, five, six. That's a six. So it plummets down, hits the ceiling, scrapes off and slams down onto him. He's going to try and make a dexterity saving throw. That is a seven plus four, nope. That's an 11. Go ahead and roll 4d8 please.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Is this Dr. Comedy, who's writhing in laughter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy's on fire from her earlier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a five. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of damage to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You only got 16 on 4d8?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not enough to kill him, but it slams on him and then falls over. You see as both of his flaming hands on the ground going, (groans). He's currently restrained underneath it right there, and on fire.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. I'm going to move towards any entrance or window I see. I can't really see over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a window here, window here. This one has flames in front of it. This one's available.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go towards that [no audio] other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Four, five. That's as far as you can move there. You see the guy on the ground who's laughing in front of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, no thanks to him. And for a bonus, I guess I will inspire Darin De Paul, or rather, Sprigg.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why not both?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (speaking) I don't know how that song goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get a d12 that you can use on any sort of skill. You don't have to use it right now, but whenever you use a skill check or an ability check you can add that to it if you want to. There you go.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Thank you. You know, I had a bad day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groaning and laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, how much fire damage does it do when they're on fire? Is it d10?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (stuttering) Oh jeez. Fire Storm. Yeah, no. d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thought so. All right, he takes eight fire damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay! Under a log.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Under a log. He's going to try and break free from restraint. Nope, that is a 14. He cannot move that giant tree that's currently crushing him on the ground. He tries to reach out for his crossbow and aim it out towards Sprigg with one hand because it's still loaded. But he has super disadvantage on this strike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Super disadvantage. Is that in the book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's in the new campaign guide. Super disadvantage. Only when you're stuck under a tree on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing on you.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crossbow drops, (grunting).

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Knock knock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crying) On fire. All righty, that ends his turn.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (whispering) Comedy comes in threes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy back here is going to go ahead and since you're the one who has his friend writhing on the ground, is going to go ahead and try to shoot you with his crossbow. You do see him, although he's unaware of that, so he thinks it's a sneak attack shot. That is a 14.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You got to get better cultists, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, seriously. They come in large numbers, so yeah. This one just (impact sound) hits the tree to your left. His aim's off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's missing an eye. His depth perception sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. And he goes ahead and darts behind this building there, vanishing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I see the bolt or any indication that he exists?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. He reveals himself when he fires. So you watched him come out of the bushes and (whoosh) fire and then duck around the side of the building. The guy on the ground is going to try and save against your spell. That is a 13 plus zero. Nope. He's still laughing. He's just on the ground, (laughing). Tears in his eyes now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love that spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Necro's dead. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Hunter's Mark the big undead monster in the room. And then I'm going to shoot him! With the Blazing Bowstring!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be careful. You might catch the building on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but I'm going to use the sharpshooter thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take minus five and do additional damage? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which I don't know if I should have done that on this particular one. It was 17 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 is exactly his armor class.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yas, Pelor queen! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then Blazing Bowstring. God dang! 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (arrow shot) First one just (impact sound) hits in the side and you see the bolt of energy arc out and the flames burn up the arrow. By the way, the wall behind you is starting to get really warm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move forward. I'm going to actually move toward the corner where Keyleth is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a guy on the ground there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, there is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So you've got to step over him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to step on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you move past, he does get a swing with his shortsword at you. Oh, wow. That's a 25.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wow. He hits me. Probably because I stepped on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think so. So you take nine points of slashing damage. Just like, (pain sound) as you're walking past.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (pain sound) Fuck. Ah, shit. Okay, I'm going to hit the big hulking thing again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I realized he had disadvantage, but I rolled another 18, so it's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay, well, yeah. I'm going to do the same thing with the big hulking guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I didn't add plus ten to the previous one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of the sharpshooter, all right. 39 last time. So go ahead and take a swing at it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks! 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up next, Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14 plus six is 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Figure out how you're going to ruin Darin's life more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. That's my one goal in life. I'm a big old homewrecker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's just 32 because I don't get sneak attack again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So the second arrow slams into him. It's still holding firm. It's taking the hits and you see parts of its body are starting to spill black liquid out of the wounds and (growls) its red eyes still beaming out from behind the metal mask in front of its face. Its arm swings back and tears some of the ceiling beams out with it. It's looking pretty rickety right now. So that ends your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it in a fireproof safe? No? Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. So I have this big asshole in front of me, yeah? The house is catching on fire, right? Yeah. Nope, she'd still be really upset and really angry. So continuing what I was saying before, she's gonna rage a little bit more and go into her fire elemental self.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unable to contain her frustration--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a good plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You technically entered the space of the guy who's on the ground, becoming a fire elemental, which lights him on fire. (screams)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even more upset. I'm gonna move right in the space of this guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whoosh) So occupying his space from this side, we'll say. She can catch you guys on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But she doesn't have to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll double-check that real fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I'm magical.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sparkle fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I sparkle fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, we can take it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? It can move through a space as narrow as one inch wide, so I'll say yes, you can maneuver through. Only if you want to, can you set things on fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go into this guy's space, engulf in flames, and do my multi-attack, two slam touch attacks.

lines.name: MATT
