lines.text: Go for it. He is now in flames.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cocked. Ooh, that's good, that's good. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 just misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. That's what you needed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First one is eight. Plus ten. 18 fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's looking pretty hurt. As you slam him with both of your flaming hands and claw across his body, where the flame hits, you see it (hissing) singes through the flesh and drags charred remains of where the muscle once was where you dragged your claws through. The body's starting to shake as it's holding its form together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's all I've got, I think. That's it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hasted action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Send all your complaints to Mike Mearls and Chris Perkins at Wizards of the Coast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, not to be a dick, but has anyone stepped on the trap on the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you know what, Vax would have avoided it. Because Vax is in the spot where it was, but Vax knew where it was, so Vax would have probably gone over it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So cool. You're doing the little splits over it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Splitsing. Van Damme-ing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, you wouldn't have, because when you threw the dagger--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a big deal. Thank you for pointing that out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But your boots are gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She stole them again? How did you do it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys glance upward as you hear a (deep swoosh) and up above you in the hole in the ceiling where there once was nothing but air, you see hovering above you a giant beholder just appear. (guttural moan) All of its eyestalks curling around it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean, it's not a big deal? That's the part that I'm confused about!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for that. So that finishes your turn, Keyleth. Pike's turn. Pike sees this--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we're retconning that in, I'm retconning (blows raspberry) when I see it.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Don't get Gargamel angry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that mean that Keyleth would have seen the beholder beforehand? You know what, don't worry about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You were so angry-- it's in the hole above. You don't quite see where that hole was at the moment, you backed away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, so much blind rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So much blind rage. Look guys, that's what we're doing. So anyway, Pike does actually make an insight check, and says, "It's not real. Don't worry about it!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not a big deal, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 20. That hits. That's going to be 4d6. 14 points of radiant damage, which will do it. So you watch as Pike blasts it in the face with the Guiding Bolt. As it hits, the mask gets thrown off, and where the head was beneath it, you see this empty black void with two red burning coals for eyes that blink out as soon as the mask is removed, and the whole body crumples to the ground and turns into a horrible, thick, black-purple ichor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to have nightmares about that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's that kind of thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Brilliant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the one guy on the ground there. One's laughing. We'll say for the purposes of this, for the time, most everything there is not much of a threat at this point. So systematically, the guy on the ground who's hidden by the tree, you can just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm ignoring him. I'm not even gonna deal. I'm just hopping in the window. I'm going to grab my little guy there. I'm going to bring him out to the balcony, and I'm going to unceremoniously toss him out of the house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Defenestrated!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You throw him (thud). He lands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then I'm going to jump and I'm going to crawl down the rest of my way and join him outside the house. And try and jump around the fire, dragging him away from the fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check. Sorry, acrobatics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Acrobatics? Bless you for an acrobatics check. I'm rerolling that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's not a saving throw. You can't do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not a saving throw. Oh well, that's fine. That's a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say for the purposes of this--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had the Spider Climb boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, I know. But Spider Climb boots only helps you if you keep on the surface. So as you leap, you manage to land on your feet, but the flames do catch you a bit, so you take six points of fire damage as you start to burn. For the purposes of time on this one, the guy who's currently under the log just burns to death there under the log. Pinned, he's trying to reach for his crossbow, but he's only fired the one bolt that was loaded in it. The guy on the ground is still laughing as you approach him.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Are there any rocks about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's quite a few heavier rocks on the ground.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Well, I look at him, and I say, "It was a prison, but it was my prison." And I use the Telekinesis ring to lift a rock and drop it on his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (splat) A horrible sickening crack sound. It slams into the head. You lift it up. The laughing has stopped, but he's still moving and you can see the face is broken. The nose is smashed to the side and it's just blood. He's starting to try and get back up.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Well, tell them that Ethred Brokenbranch sends his regards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you let him get up?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets up. (grunting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll Lightning Bolt him as he runs away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, we'll say for the purposes of this, he runs off in the distance (footsteps, yelp) and falls to the ground, no longer moving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I kill the guy on the floor? Can he be mine, please? Can I please smash him? The guy that's lying on the floor in the house, please?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just sit on him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I haven't Gallaghered anybody in a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's on the ground on fire now, going (frantic gasps) patting out the fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Grog, put him out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He spends his action putting the fire out now, and is like, (frantic gasps).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth takes a few steps back and motions as a fire elemental...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I skip on in and (gibberish yell).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like, (scream, impact). Just smashed on the ground. Red watermelon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fire's out, I'm assuming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop my fire form, turn, see my anger, destruction, get immediately guilty, and then do a Tidal Wave to quell the flames.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of the interior is destroyed. You have two giant holes in the back. Most of the upper ceiling is ruined. The house is in shambles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the books?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of them have been destroyed. Some of the ones on the back wall have been burned. Some of them have been burned by people in flames or made of flame or general black ichor that spilled out. The house is pretty wrecked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go over to them and see if I can find some books I think Percy would like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm running over to see that staff with an eye in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27? Okay. You start glancing through. You find some history books. You find some that relate to local history. You see some books that relate to various types of creatures; some animals and beasts. Many that are encyclopedias of various rivers and it's scattered everywhere. It's just universal knowledge of pretty much anything he can get his hands on. So some of it seems less useful than others but you hand-pick a few out that you think Percy would like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't mean to ask the obvious question, but how did he know we were here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's not an obvious question. I have no idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They have multiple eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But how? Was he watching us? Is he scrying on us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Must have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's fucking scrying on us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe he can feel you the way you can feel him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that's not how this works.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He had another eye, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that thing have an eye in it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The staff you see? It's a carved eye. It's made of wood and paint. It's ornamental. It's mainly used as a focus, technically acts as a plus-one staff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you mean that?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Of course I meant it, boy. I've been there for years.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you leave? If you wanted.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Of course I can. The prison was more up here than in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Sorry about the prison, then.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Why would you be sorry? I asked you for power and redemption. Don't you feel you gave me that? We lived, child. We all lived.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Yes. That is indeed what I was hoping for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I lean out the window. Hey, Sprigg!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Hello!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Hi! How are you? I have some arrows in me at the moment. You like arrows, don't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do. Come in here, I'll take them off your hands.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Okay. Question: if you do that, I'd probably die again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll cure you, darling. Don't worry.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: She called me darling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's the cutest.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Previously where you had to hunch, you're now having to almost belly crawl inside the house.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But why? There's no separation between the first and the second floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you stand in that space, you're fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm in my space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to prop our idiot up in the window so I can go in and keep an eye on him even while I'm inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a prisoner?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I kept one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he's one of those creepy ghouls that probably doesn't speak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And in the last minute or so has not been able to break free but is still trying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He automatically fails until 24 hours has elapsed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After the first failed save?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any further attempts by the creature automatically fail until 24 hours have elapsed. He ain't going nowhere. It's mean, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Pike can heal him as I take the arrows out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: At last you've seen the

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sarcastic laugh) Sprigg, anything valuable in here that you want to save before we get you out of here?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Would like my organs! Oh, I would like to save those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: All right. No. There's nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No keys to Ioun? You know where she is?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I might. I hope I do. I hope that I can give you the answers you seek.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope so, too. I cast Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike casts Cure Wounds on you, as well, and you heal 18.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Do I know her name yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Cleric.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pike."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You can call me Sprigg. Can you help me pray to Ioun? We need answers, and I think together we might find them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can certainly try. Do you have any items of her iconography?"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, actually. You just reach over and find one of the undamaged books.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You healed 19, by the way.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Thank you. Use this and you talk to her where I can't. At least, not yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know if I can talk to her. I'm not... But I can help you pray. I don't know if "it'll be enough."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Let's give it a go. There's a first time for everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Grog!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can you help me clear some of the floor, please?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a problem! (grunting) Keyleth, catch!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah! Ow! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Floorboards! In her face!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought you were on fire. I'm really sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike takes you over to the center of the room and tells you. "Kneel with me. Now take this "book and close your eyes and... apologize."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For everything you said about Ioun."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (grumbles) All right. Well, look the other way. Find some things that are of value.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whistles)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket sits down next to him and stares, but I'll turn around.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: All right. I don't know if you're listening, Ioun. It's been many years since I've actually spoken to a god. I'd like to express my deepest sorrow. You see, this home... didn't mean as much to me as life. And I think these people gave that to me. If you could give us... If you could give me anything, any little hint, it would be greatly appreciated and I would be a warrior in your name forevermore. Please. Was that okay, bear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (huffs, licking) Licks the side of your face.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: No, I'm not crying. You're crying, bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sit there in silence with your eyes closed, concentrating, holding the book before you. Doesn't seem to be an answer. Just silence in the darkness. Nothing. Everyone wants to look at him-- still turned away?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth is definitely staring, but pretending not to stare.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm watching through the book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm leaning against the wall and staring at him now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing. Nothing responds. As you have your eyes closed, you hear this soft chuckle in the far corner of the room. (cackles) "Really? Praying, are you?"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes. Can you help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do I look the kind of guy that would help?"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes. I've known you for 19 years and I think anybody's capable of anything, so why don't you do something unexpected?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think you're right. It's no longer your prison. It's not mine, either."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (flapping) Flies out the window.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Kraghammer has another performer, and not a very good one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you've been talking, by the way, and the silence has been sad. Taking in the slight emotional cut that not getting a response and putting yourself on that limb means nothing. The rest of you notice his torso is glowing bright blue.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Is it really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your stomach is glowing.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Growing? What? I didn't eat anything. How could my stomach be growing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're blue balling.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Look down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike looks at you and takes your hands and opens your arms and motions to your chest. And the book in your hand, you pull aside. You glance down and you can see, there's this soft, bluish glow that's emanating from your torso. Strange.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I've found my religion. (chuckling) I'm Bluish! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw, man!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It didn't happen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it did. That's canon.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Wait a second, gentlemen. We'll restart for just a second. It'll be fine. That little imp is gone. So apparently, the key... is me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is you? It is you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is in you or is you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is him. I've known it from the minute that I laid eyes upon him. It's him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did? You knew that the moment you saw him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I mean I had a hunch, I had a feeling, deep down inside. I can't say it. If I say it out loud and then if it's not true then I'm an asshole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To be fair, we've only been here 12 minutes.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes. House gone. The imp gone. Burny, burny. Sad, sad. Pray, nothing happened. Now I'm blue. That's a day for you, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So do you glow brighter the closer we get? What's the deal here?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I've never glowed before, child.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's glown.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I've never glowned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you're the key, where's the lock? Where do we take you?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Well, I have been gone for many, many years, so English may have changed. To be fair. To be fair. I don't know. This is all new to me. I would have thought it would be in one of those tomes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pick up the book that he was holding when he was praying. I'm going to just try and read it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You glance through it. The book is a simple book, talking about the construction of barricades and it looks like it was less the contents of the book and more just the image of the book itself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hand him the book again and see if maybe there's focus to be found. Maybe this is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, lord. Ooh. Let's call that a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you took the book from him and handed him another book, there was a very faint vibration to his body as you pulled it from him and gave it back to him. Which you haven't noticed, but there's a physical vibration to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it's all-- with your permission, I'm going to take his hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You feel them, and you feel this very faint vibration to his body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Continue holding his hands. I pull out the Tome of Quick Movement. Hold. Hold while I find the paper. Hold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if he's a tuning fork?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shushes)

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That's very rude.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where is it? I have a lot of things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Divining.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh yes. A divining rod. A rod to the divine. Perhaps I am a divining rod.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I mean.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Well said, child!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out the fork we that we got to get to Elysium. Is it similar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you pull out the fork and you hold it, you recall that whenever you cast the spell Plane Shift, there was a faint vibration to the specific fork when you cast the spell.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: He's the tuning fork.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What, no? This is good!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Sprigg. No, it's fine. It's good. I don't know. Everything in my life seems to have this impermanence factor about it. So I hope he's not something that can be used and discarded.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I haven't been used in 37 years.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sprigg.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It's all right. At least I wasn't discarded all that time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sure it's fine, I just--

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Look. Look at me. Just remember. Whatever happens, remember me. That's all that's important.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good advice.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (coughs and sniffles) Dusty in here, isn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Sprigg.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (sniffles and coughs) I remember. (softer) I remember. See? It's all up here. So whatever happens, keep me there. All right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess I have to start getting used to losing things.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes. Or you can be hidden away in a prison for 37 years. And that's not life, child. That's hiding. Don't hide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've already built my own prison. They don't know. I'm already there.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You can break out. You can. It's hard. But you can do it. Just take the first step. And then you take another one. And then you take another one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I grab his hand, and with that, I cast Plane Shift to wherever he is leading to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The rest of you gathered hands for this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there enough of us? Trinket, in the necklace. Quick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket. (roars) Into the necklace.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Wait. My invisible frog companion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he real?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are walls on each side of this chamber, about 30 or 40 feet from you, and one arched hallway across from you that leads to the only other chamber you've seen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I immediately turn and look to see if Sprigg is still holding my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sprigg is still holding your hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See? All that fucking shit was for nothing! He's still alive!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you the same Sprigg as before?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I hope so. Let's ask my invisible frog companion. Well, I guess we'd better go find what we are looking for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Glad you're with us, Sprigg.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It's good to be alive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Remember that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your eyes, now attuned to the realms beyond mortality, you catch glimpses of shifting wind gathering books and turning pages. Spirits of the library, though sparse as they may be from this entry point, organizing. Reading and learning from whatever words are within. You begin to almost get vertigo, trying to contemplate the strange and overwhelming construction of such a wondrous place. An endless sea of stories. Spectral custodians keeping the tales of each other and the history of Exandria past, present, and binding the pages to tell what will eventually be the present, currently the future.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've dreamed of this place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Inside Matt's brain?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs, chuckles) I may never leave. I glide over to Vex and hold her close. This is stunning. My god, I think they may have actually forgotten all the idiot things I said yesterday.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Feels pretty good, doesn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry. May have panicked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give him a kiss.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be right back. I'm going to run towards one of those stacks, like a child.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You begin to take the first--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm doing a title run. I want to figure out the organizational system before I touch a book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no words on any of the spines.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pick one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You pick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I pick it up. I look around to see if anybody has a problem. And I turn to the title page.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's ironic you do this, because the book is in Celestial.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I read Celestial.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Glancing through, it appears to be describing a birth. Describing a tunnel, then a light, then a cry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I skip to the end. Last page.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to be an older man, surrounded by his family--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got it. I put it down. I pick up another one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance through this book.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First page.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Begins very similarly to the last one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Last page.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one actually ends with what appears to be a horseback riding accident.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, they're souls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 115 pages in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 115 pages in you get to a page that seems to talk about the sorrow of a lost romance, and trying to deal, coping at a young adult age.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put it back and I turn. They're made of people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what? It's skin books?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's people! And I'm going to find the most interesting spine and I'm going to turn to the first. Birth. Death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't read that, dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Birth! Death! Sex. Birth, death, some disappointment. I am just gone. I'm running back and forth, finding whatever interesting spine I can. Are they all in Celestial?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are currently. All the ones you've picked up are in Celestial.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god. Okay. This is great. All right. I'm eventually probably going to pass out from mild hyperventilation and have to sit down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should maybe find Ioun, don't you think?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we must, yes. Just as an experiment, I'm going to think about Vesper and try and touch a book. I don't expect this to work, but I'm going to close my eyes and think about, and pick it up and flip through it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You grab a tome and pull it forth, and as you read through the story, it's an unfamiliar one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a system. I will discover the system. I'm going to keep running around like a kid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are the rest of you guys doing while Percival is running around like a kid?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not interested in the fucking books.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does anything in Primordial stick out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing about, none of the spines have anything written on them, so you have to start pulling a few books out and opening them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hold my hand over and pull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You open it up. It's not in a language you understand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put it back and get frustrated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've stopped. I'm good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Watched her the whole time and quietly walk up behind and give her a hug from behind and don't say anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any doors leading forward or back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a labyrinth of bookshelves. There's a path forward between, two or three ahead of you, but then it comes to an end where it splits off in two directions. Like I said, they travel up infinitely, so you're not quite sure which way leads where.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Sprigg still glowing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sprigg is, actually-- There's a very faint blue glow in him that never really faded since your arrival.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Warmer?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Sprigg. Stand over there!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Is there any change in the glow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No noticeable change.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn. Sprigg, stand over there!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I just was shot with a bunch of arrows, so give me a second. I run over there, stop halfway and go, ow, and then I continue. When I get there, any change in the glow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh, it's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No discernible difference.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're inspired, if you want to use inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a natural one. It's an auto-fail.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a card catalog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a central area info desk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an investigation check to begin to wander around and try to find your way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan seems to walk with purpose into one of the random rows.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm clutching my Ioun stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. Anyone else do anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He seems to have purpose. I'm giddily following behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Percy's following Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to walk with Percy. Oh, and Trinket's out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket (bear grunt) looks confused and starts looking up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I know, dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Falls onto his back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are Vex and Percy walking with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, they are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to whip out my flute and I start going, (wedding march).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. He may have heard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He heard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought you were going to die! I may have panicked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were asked to plead for your life, and I may have panicked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who did you tell? Percival, who did you tell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at your shirt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? (screams) No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I panicked!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I panicked! There was a giant glowing sun, and I may have panicked. Well, I was a bit vague, but I was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A bit vague? Scanlan, what did he say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First comes love. Then comes marriage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may have hinted that we might have eloped. May have hinted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you're married?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may have hinted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, no, you said you were betrothed to be married? Wait, you're married? Oh, wow, you just spilled it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Silence! Cone of Silence!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're married!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is just absolute quiet. What are the rest of you guys doing?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I run in the corner and see if I glow again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth and Vax heard the (wedding march), so we had a very different silent scene over in our spot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Keyleth was quietly sobbing in Vax's arms and then heard (wedding march) and went (angry roar).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why is that bad? Why was that angry?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because we don't get that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're one of those couples.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, vacation Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Worst double date sangria partners ever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's back, ladies and gentlemen. He's back and taking no prisoners.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you guys going on vacation? We got a divorce.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the Debbie Downer SNL sketch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not moving and hoping this is all over soon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just endless books, beyond what you can see! Are there chairs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like Pike would've comforted him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Pike comes over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are chairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, there aren't. She goes, "Do you want to go with everyone else, Grog?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. Do you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's okay, yeah! They're walking."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to leave. Fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The faster we follow them, then the faster we can go."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I bet you could read some of these books."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bet not. These are really tall books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come on." She grabs your hand and begins tugging you behind her. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me and him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leaning into each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you guys stay there.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'm trying to see if I'm glowing anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run around for a good minute and a half and you're not seeing any sort of change.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Nothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Can I go forward into the bookcases and look right and left to see where they lead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. You turn around the corner and see them disappear around the edge.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'll continue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you follow them. As you guys are having this silent argument, Sprigg catches up to you, but you hear nothing, Sprigg, as they're all going...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just turned it off. I got everyone to agree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi. How's it going?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Glowing. You are, too! What's going on with that? Yeah, you seem to be blushing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so hot in here. It's very hot in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike and Grog catch up around the corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you find? The way out? Exit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seems like it could be this way. We'll have to band together and go forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where did you get the sunglasses from?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's glowing in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Ioun stone actually is giving a faint glow similar to the glow that you see emanating from Sprigg's torso.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it glowing any more than--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. That's an eight. Maybe 11, I don't know. Do I add Jack of All Trades?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yeah. If you're not--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I really want to know. I will inspire myself, and I'll add a d12. That makes it 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You start getting the sense, the further you walk, both your stone and Sprigg are beginning to emanate a slightly stronger glow, and so you guys begin to realize that this could be used as a path to something. You're not quite sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So everyone's going behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Imagination clarification, because a Silence effect went off there. Did Vax and Keyleth hear, "You're married?" Or was that all covered by Silence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he crushed that in Silence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we heard the song, but that's it. Good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone else has gone ahead and vanished into the library. You guys are staying?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Noticing that we're totally alone, silently tug Keyleth down after them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I felt that honesty was important at that moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it very much is. I'm very glad. I'm just surprised he didn't say anything. I spoke with him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was acting nobly. I won't tell anyone if you don't want me to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We had to tell them eventually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're following the stone, you hear some footfalls as Vax and Keyleth catch up to you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We already know. It's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're engaged. You don't have to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Engagement. But you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You fucking liars. You fucking liars! Just tell us! We know!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got married.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We may have gotten married.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. (sarcastically) Oh, surprise!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was going to be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (weakly) Celebration!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We didn't want to make it a thing. We wanted it to just be--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's wonderful when two people can fall in love and have each other forever and ever. That's nice. No, I mean it! You guys are great. You're super cute together. You'll make Whitestone-- You'll be celebrities there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have to get you gifts?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they eloped, so we're clear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very specifically, no. This place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's amazing. And Keyleth lights up her flame hands as she walks off in a fury.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you not know what this place means? Am I the only one who understands what this place means?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would love to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It all matters!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: None of us have forgotten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I mean, really! It all matters! So much, and it's not going to go away! Nothing goes away!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it only gets filed away in some library where no one else can experience it except for, what, one, maybe two people ever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One and two people are all that it takes to experience something!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sitting 40 feet from you in the center of the dome, no larger than a normal person, is an older woman with long, wavy silver hair. Her olive skin is somewhat weathered and wrinkled around her almond eyes, but the warmth of her smile, and her vibrant purple irises put you at ease immediately. Her blue and white robes tumble out from her form in tendrils of parchment that snake through the pillows like roots. She smiles as you turn and see her. "I felt that you would find me." And that's where we'll end tonight's session.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, Matt. Wow, Darin!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can everybody watching still at home give a round of applause for Darin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seriously. If you're available, you may want to, if you can, come and join us for the first half maybe. Not next week, but the week after Comic Con, if you're interested. Because I want to roleplay out you meeting Ioun.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It would be an honor. You know how important this is to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great. I'll look forward to having you back in a couple weeks, then.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: And I will see you next weekend, as well!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, indeed. Oh, Comic Con. Guys, thank you so much. Great game, well done. Breaking stuff, apparently. Once again, we have no episode next week because we'll be at Comic Con, but we have our panel on Saturday for Critical Role. Love you guys, hope you have a wonderful night, and is it Thursday yet? Good night! [music]
